description:
Implement a sophisticated DI container that manages component lifetimes (singleton, scoped, transient) and supports hierarchical scopes for request-level, tenant-level, and application-level dependencies with proper disposal.

**Rationale:** With numerous services, repositories, and integrations, proper dependency management is essential for testability and resource management. Lifetime scopes prevent memory leaks, enable request-scoped caching, and make the codebase more maintainable and testable.
title: Create a Dependency Injection Container with Lifetime Scopes
